Function Details

assertMaximumRMSErrorAngle(q1, q2, maxRMSE, errMsg='')

source code 

Assert that max RMSE between 2 QuaternionArrays is less than maxRMSE.

Parameters:
  • q1 - The first QuaternionArray.
  • q2 - The second QuaternionArray.
  • maxRMSE - The maximum allowable RMS error in degrees.
  • errMsg - Additional errod detail to display if the assertion fails.

assert_quaternions_correlated(actual, desired, targetCorrelation=0.95, errMsg='')

source code 

Assert that correlation between two quaternion arrays is greater than a specified target.

Correlations are calculated as the diagonal of the upper right quadrant of the full correlation matrix. Each of the diagonal elements of this sub-matrix represents the correlation between an actual vector component and its corresponding desired value.

Parameters:
  • actual - Actual QuaternionArray.
  • desired - Desired QuaternionArray.
  • targetCorrelation - Minimum correlation to accept.
  • errMsg - Additional error detail to display if an assertion fails.
